thread.title: Announcing the First Meet the Judges Meetup on Oct. 14th
thread.title_full: Announcing the First Meet the Judges Meetup on Oct. 14th

author: Christine Healy
title: Announcing the First Meet the Judges Meetup on Oct. 14th
text:
SHARE Announcing the First Meet the Judges Meetup on Oct. 14th Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here!We're gearing up for the hottest event of the year, 50 on Fire on December 10th from 7 to 10 p.m. ( TO Submit your 50 on Fire nomination here! 
We're gearing up for the hottest event of the year, 50 on Fire on December 10th from 7 to 10 p.m. (venue will be announced soon!) The event will celebrate the Districts most forward-thinking innovators with a night of festive cocktails, delicious food and fun. It is an awards event like no other and you won't want to miss out. 
Leading up to the main event, we're hosting three Meet the Judges Meetups allowing nominees, past winners and community leaders to network with our expert panel of judges over cocktails and light bites. In two weeks, the first meetup is hitting Johnny Pistolas on Wednesday, October 14th from 6 to 8pm. Get your ticket, that includes your first drink and apps, here ! Three lucky finalists, selected at the meetup will have the chance to pitch the judges on the spot and convince the crowd why they should be dubbed on fire . When you arrive at the event, drop your business card at check in for a chance to pitch. Two more Meet the Judges Meetups will held on November 5th and November 19th. Save the dates, consider upgrading to the Meet the Judges VIP Series Pass below and stay tuned for more information to come. 
Know a company or individual setting fire to their scene? Submit a nomination now . 50 on Fire main event tickets are available here and Meet the Judges Meetup tickets are available here or below. Want to align your brand with 50 on Fire and DC Inno events? Click here for more information.
